data.name: ArgumentException_Shared_ValueCannotBeNullWhitespaceOrAnEmptyString
data.value: Value cannot be null, whitespace or an empty string.

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_Shared_EndLineNumberMustBeMinus1OrGreaterThanOrEqualToStartLineNumber
data.value: The option {0} must be -1 or not less than its associated start line number. The specified value "{1}" with associated start line number "{2}" is invalid.

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_Shared_OptionMustBeGreaterThan0
data.value: The option {0} must be greater than 0. The specified value "{1}" is invalid.

data.name: ArgumentOutOfRangeException_Shared_ValueCannotBeNegative
data.value: Value cannot be negative. The specified value "{0}" is invalid.

data.name: ArgumentOutOfRangeException_Shared_ValueMustBeWithinRange
data.value: Value must be within range {0}. The specified value "{1}" is invalid.

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_SourceRetrieverService_FailedAfterMultipleAttempts
data.value: Multiple attempts to retrieve content from the remote URI "{0}" have failed. Please ensure that the URI is valid and that your network connection is stable. Enable debug level logging and try again for more information on why requests are failing.

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_SourceRetrieverService_RemoteUriAccessForbidden
data.value: Access to the remote URI "{0}" is forbidden.

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_SourceRetrieverService_RemoteUriDoesNotExist
data.value: The remote URI "{0}" does not exist.

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_FlexiIncludeBlock_OptionMustBeAValidUri
data.value: The option {0} must be a valid URI. The specified value "{1}" is invalid.

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_FlexiBlocksException_InvalidFlexiBlock
data.value: The {0} starting at line "{1}", column "{2}", is invalid: {3}

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_Shared_OptionIsAnInvalidFormat
data.value: The option {0} has invalid value "{1}". Refer to the inner exception for more details.

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_FlexiBlocksException_InvalidMarkdown
data.value: The markdown at line "{0}", column "{1}" is invalid: {2}

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_FlexiOptionsBlockService_MispositionedBlock
data.value: FlexiOptionsBlock must immediately precede the block that consumes it.

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_FlexiCodeBlocksExtension_OptionLineRangeNotASubset
data.value: The line range "{0}" in option {1} is not a subset of the full range of lines, "[1, {2}]".

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_FlexiCodeBlockOptions_OptionLineRangesCannotOverlap
data.value: The line ranges in option {0} are invalid. These line ranges must not overlap, but the line ranges "{1}" and "{2}" do.

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_FlexiCodeBlockOptions_OptionLineRangesMustBeSequential
data.value: The line ranges in option {0} are invalid. These line ranges must be sequential, the line range "{1}" must be specified after line range "{2}".

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_FlexiIncludeBlock_OptionMustBeAnAbsoluteUri
data.value: The option {0} must be an absolute URI. The specified value "{1}" is invalid.

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_Shared_OptionMustBeAValidEnumValue
data.value: The value "{0}" for option {1} is not within the range of valid values for the enum {2}.

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_Shared_UnableToParseJson
data.value: Unable to parse JSON "{0}". Refer to the inner exception for more details.

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_FlexiOptionsBlockParser_UnconsumedBlock
data.value: FlexiOptionsBlock must be consumed.

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_FlexiBlocksException_ExceptionOccurredWhileProcessingABlock
data.value: An exception occurred while processing the block. Refer to the inner exception for more details.

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_FlexiBlockParser_ExceptionOccurredWhileAttemptingToOpenBlock
data.value: An exception occurred in "{0}" while attempting to open a block. Refer to the inner exception for more details.

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_FlexiIncludeBlockParser_CycleFound
data.value: The following cycle was found in the FlexiIncludeBlock tree: {0}

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_FlexiIncludeBlockParser_InvalidClippingNoLineContainsEndLineSubstring
data.value: Invalid clipping, no line contains end line substring "{0}".

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_FlexiIncludeBlockParser_InvalidClippingNoLineContainsStartLineSubstring
data.value: Invalid clipping, no line contains start line substring "{0}".

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_FlexiIncludeBlock_OptionMustBeAUriWithASupportedScheme
data.value: The option {0} must be a URI with scheme FILE, HTTP or HTTPS. The specified URI "{1}" has invalid scheme "{2}".

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_Clipping_OptionMustBeWithinRange
data.value: The option {0} must be within the range "{1}". The specified value "{2}" is invalid.

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_DiskCacheService_InvalidDiskCacheDirectory
data.value: The disk cache directory "{0}" is invalid. Refer to the inner exception for more details.

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_DiskCacheService_UnexpectedDiskCacheException
data.value: An unexpected exception occurred when attempting to retrieve the source for "{0}", from the disk cache at "{1}". Refer to the inner exception for more information.

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_Shared_OptionsMustNotBeNull
data.value: The option {0} cannot be null.

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_SourceRetrieverService_InvalidLocalUri
data.value: The local URI "{0}" is invalid. Refer to the inner exception for more details.

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_FlexiIncludeBlockParser_ExceptionOccurredWhileProcessingSource
data.value: An exception occured while processing the FlexiIncludeBlock's source, "{0}". Refer to the inner exception for more details.

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_FlexiIncludeBlockParser_ExceptionOccurredWhileProcessingContent
data.value: An exception occured while processing the FlexiIncludeBlock's {0}. Refer to the inner exception for more details.

data.name: FlexiBlocksException_FlexiIncludeBlockParser_ExceptionOccurredWhileProcessingBlock
data.value: An exception occured while processing the FlexiIncludeBlock.

data.name: LogWarning_SourceRetrieverService_FailureStatusCode
data.value: Http request to "{0}" failed with status code "{1}", {2} tries remaining.

data.name: LogWarning_SourceRetrieverService_HttpRequestException
data.value: A HttpRequestException with message "{0}" occurred when attempting to retrieve content from "{1}", {2} tries remaining.

data.name: LogWarning_SourceRetrieverService_Timeout
data.value: Attempt to retrieve content from "{0}" timed out, {1} tries remaining.

data.name: LogWarning_DiskCacheService_FileInUse
data.value: The file "{0}" is in use. {1} tries remaining.

data.name: InvalidOperationException_LineEmbellisherService_InvalidMarkupFragmentWithInnerException
data.value: The markup fragment "{0}" is invalid. An exception was thrown while attempting to split multi-line elements within it. Refer to the inner exception for more details.

data.name: InvalidOperationException_LineEmbellisherService_InvalidMarkupFragment
data.value: The markup fragment "{0}" is invalid. An exception was thrown while attempting to split multi-line elements within it.
